text.tspan: Loan from a financial institution, poorest 40% vs. richest 60%, 2014
Percentage of survey respondents who report borrowing any money in the past 12 months (by themselves or
together with someone else) from a bank or another type of financial institution (excluding credit cards).
Borrowed from a financial institution, income, richest 60% (% ages 15+)
Borrowed from a financial institution, income, poorest 40% (% ages
